entries.content: I'd love to work with you, I've just got to see if my boss will pay.
entries.notes: Common stall/condition related to needing approval for payment.

entries.content: Automatically qualify out prospects who state they need boss approval to pay for personal development/training.
entries.notes: Speaker's specific policy/reaction to the 'boss will pay' stall, viewed as lack of commitment.

entries.content: There is a difference between a desire to get better and a commitment to get better. Commitment involves personal investment (cash, time, risk).
entries.notes: Underlying principle for disqualifying prospects needing boss approval for personal investment.

entries.content: Make it a condition for engaging with an organization that their salespeople must contribute towards their own training cost.
entries.notes: Speaker's own conditional requirement for client engagement, based on principle of commitment.

focus_area: Handling "Think About It": "What specifically?", Conditional closing
